alert.note: Alert for Chester (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 8:40PM EDT until June 26 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Chester County in southeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 839 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cochranville, or 14 miles northwest of Newark, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... West Chester, Coatesville, Downingtown, Oxford, Parkesburg, West Grove, Honey Brook, Homeville, Cochranville, Glenmoore, Lionville, Marshallton, Lionville-Marchwood, West Goshen, Atglen, South Coatesville, Avondale, Modena, Exton and Thorndale. This includes Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 307 and 312. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
